channel.title: Super Alpine
channel.description: Stories and photography from the Super Alpine magazine, the Chamonix Travel Guide, Swiss Passes and more

item.title: The remarkable and tragic life of Jean Vuarnet
item.dc:creator: Andrew Revitt
item.description: Olympic ski champion Jean Vuarnet's success was overshadowed by tragedy when his wife & son died in a cult's mass suicide.

item.title: Bond in the Alps
item.dc:creator: Andrew Revitt
item.description: We take a look at the how the Alps came to define the James Bond character, what impact they had on Ian Fleming and the locations used in the book and film series.
